com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.action
Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.action.ActionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpartanManager
public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpartanManager

The action Manager is the component responsible for updating all the actions in the system. This is the update of the game. The user can register actions into the manager and forget about them, these actions will expire by their own and the action manager cleans all ended actions.

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

Method Detail

getInstance

public static ActionManager getInstance()
Obtains the current active instance of the action manager

Returns:
a handle the current active instance of the action manager, null if no active instance is selected

registerAction

public final void registerAction(IGameActionObject action)
                          throws SpartanException
Registers an action into the action manager. Only after performing this step is the action updated.

Parameters:
action - the action to be updated
Throws:
SpartanException - if any error occurs

getAction

public final IGameActionObject getAction(java.lang.String id,
                                         IGameEntityObject entity)
Obtains an action by its id and its owner entity. There can be only one action per pair (id, owner entity)

Parameters:
id - the id to which the action is known
entity - the entity that is the owner of the action (may be null)
Returns:
an action if any is found, null otherwise

unregisterAction

public final void unregisterAction(java.lang.String id,
                                   IGameEntityObject entity)
Unregisters actions, removing it from the update cycle.

Parameters:
id - the id to which the action is known
entity - the entity that is the owner of the action (may be null)

unregisterAction

public final void unregisterAction(IGameActionObject action)
Unregisters actions, removing it from the update cycle.

Parameters:
action - the intended action to be removed.

getActions

public final java.util.Collection<IGameActionObject> getActions()
Obtains all the actions currently being updated by the manager.

Returns:
a Collection of actions

reset

public void reset()
Resets the action manager, removing all actions for the update cycle.

updateActions

public void updateActions(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                          org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame sbg,
                          int delta)
The update method that is invoked to advance all the actions in the system.

Parameters:
gc - Slick2d game container
sbg - Slick2d State base game
delta - the time in milliseconds after the last update
